name: py-snakemake-storage-plugin-zenodo

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: A Snakemake storage plugin for reading from and writing to zenodo.org.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-snakemake-interface-common
dependencies.description: Common functions and classes for Snakemake and its plugins.

dependencies.name: py-snakemake-interface-storage-plugins
dependencies.description:
This package provides a stable interface for interactions between
Snakemake and its storage plugins.
